name: Mr. Magnet
description:
WGJ Week 134 Theme: Magnet

I am only in Grade 8 and love developing games in my free time. This is my first game jam, and I'd appreciate any feedback, thx!

Contact me on Discord: NoohAlavi#8625

Some of my friends helped out too, you can DM them (Discord) at:

sovergin#8225

_Yahya_#2650

Lamborghini#7308

Magnets are either of positive or negative polarity. You play as a positive polarity magnet, who must collect other positive magnets, which are you repel, while avoiding negative magnets, which you attract.
